reviews.review_text: If you're looking for consistency, very detailed, and overall great experience this is the spot to go to! I've been going to Fernando for over a year + and will continue. Fernando is an outstanding professional at his craft. I've walked in and asked for different styles and he has given great recommendations and after every cut I get a boost of confidence, I've gotten many compliments from my haircuts! Hes made booking very easy through appointments and always gives a hospitable feeling at his barber studio. I always get a haircut, beard trim and sometimes get my eye brows. Highly recommend to book with Fernando!

reviews.review_text: I have been going to Fernando for a few months now ever since I parted ways with my old barber/friend who moved on to a new career path. And I would definitely say I'm very happy with his service. Ever since the first time he cut my hair I noticed how detailed he was and he absolutely nailed the look I was going for. And Weirdly enough ever since I started getting my haircuts from Fernando my hair has had more texture and honestly never looked this good before. My dude got that magic üôå Definitely became a loyal client to him and I wouldn't go to anyone else. üëç

reviews.review_text: This guy is a master with scissors! Not only does he deliver top-notch haircuts every time, but he's also super efficient. I've never had to wait long for my appointment, and he always seems to finish right as his next client arrives for their appointment. The attention to detail is impressive ‚Äì he listens to what you want, can give advice to better help you nail that look you're after, and nails it. I highly recommend Mr. Fernando for anyone looking for a reliable, skilled barber who respects your time. Don't forget to tip your barber and make sure to buy some Reuzelüêñ ‚Äì you won't regret it.üòéü•É

reviews.review_text: I first went to Fernando for an undercut, which I loved! But I'm growing my hair now. But for the last 3 years, he has been cutting my sons hair. I wouldn't take him to anyone else since my son is on the spectrum and also has cochlear implants. Fernando is such a patient person letting him take breaks, especially his bathroom break right when he just started to cut his hair lol, and he finds ways to make cutting my son's hair fun. He even accommodates to he's sensory needs that other barber shops didn't. I hope you guys check him out!

reviews.raw_text: Jacqueline 2 reviews 9 months ago I first went to Fernando for an undercut, which I loved! But I'm growing my hair now. But for the last 3 years, he has been cutting my sons hair. I wouldn't take him to anyone else since my son is on the spectrum and also has cochlear implants. Fernando is such a patient person letting him take breaks, especially his bathroom break right when he just started to cut his hair lol, and he finds ways to make cutting my son's hair fun. He even accommodates to he's sensory needs that other barber shops didn't. I hope you guys check him out!

reviews.review_text: Great cuts and good vibes. Fernando has a close attention to detail and his new shop is very cool to hang out in. The Room is full of art to look at as you get a haircut and the music sets a good mood. Fernando also is willing to help guide you when you're trying a new style and is very knowledgeable. Overall is a great place to get a haircut and I strongly recommend it
